channel.title: Client ip
channel.description: hi all, i been working on my client since 4 days and now everything seems to be okay, but when i change the ip in client folder and start the client it says: "error cinnecting to server" i tried over 4 sources and it gives the same result....i'v portforwarded so correctly and i can see port "43594" open on my ip, beside the ip is online aswell but won't work on the client? please help me as soon as posible. i am using 525 client thx for reading..

item.title: Client ip
item.dc:creator: @noor359 noor359
item.description:
@noor359 wrote:

[quote=“CoderOops, post:15, topic:514887”]port 80 is not for rsps>_>… I hope you know what you’re doing.[/quote]ik it’s not for rsps but when i open port 80 and i used my host ip which is “127.0.0.1” the server start working perfectly, but when i block port “80” and used port 43594 it says error conneting to server which means, i must portforward both ports to be able to start the start well…

Read full topic

@marc110 wrote:

[quote=“noor359, post:4, topic:514887”][quote author=Kamran1 link=topic=633137.msg4278714#msg4278714 date=1365261460]
Change YOUR clients ip to 127.0.0.1 leave other players client ip as open one
[/quote]yes, i did but then it says “no response from server try using another word”[/quote]

i had this problem while working offline i changed the ip to 127.0.0.1 and then installed hamachi and it runs offline without the interent
